history.proof: srun best use: ball_sym unfold: Relation_Definitions.relation, close, pos, Init.Nat.pred.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rabs_Ropp (Rabs (- _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment H : forall x : R, Rabs (- x) = Rabs x M : UniformSpace x, y : M H0 : close x y Unable to unify "Rabs ?M2477 = ?M2477" with "forall eps : posreal, ball y eps x".

In environment H2 : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> Rabs x = x H1 : forall x : R, Rabs (- x) = Rabs x M : UniformSpace x, y : M H0 : close x y Unable to unify "?M2575 < ?M2576 \\/ ?M2575 = ?M2576" with "forall eps : posreal, ball y eps x".

In environment H4 : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> Rabs x = x H3 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 < r2 -> r1 <= r2 H : forall x : R, Rabs (- x) = Rabs x M : UniformSpace x, y : M H0 : close x y Unable to unify "0 < 1" with "close y x".

original: rewrite Rabs_Ropp. apply Rabs_pos_eq. apply Rlt_le. apply Rlt_0_1.
